publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3333 Robin Harper: Barnardo’s/HBOS Tug of War—That the Parliament congratulates all those MSPs and staff who took part in the inaugural Holyrood Tug O’War organised by HBOS plc and Barnardo’s Scotland which raised £2,750 for the charity; congratulates the Scottish Conservatives’ “Pullman Class” team on its victory; recognises the support of all the other competing teams and that they enjoyed themselves hugely, and thanks HBOS plc, Barnardo’s Scotland and the Scottish Tug of War Association for providing an entertaining and welcome addition to the parliamentary calendar.

S2M-3333 Robin Harper: Barnardo’s/HBOS Tug of War—That the Parliament congratulates all those MSPs and staff who took part in the inaugural Holyrood Tug O’War organised by HBOS plc and Barnardo’s Scotland which raised £2,750 for the charity; congratulates the Scottish Conservatives’ “Pullman Class” team on its victory; recognises the support of all the other competing teams and that they enjoyed themselves hugely, and thanks HBOS plc, Barnardo’s Scotland and the Scottish Tug of War Association for providing an entertaining and welcome addition to the parliamentary calendar. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*
S2M-3333 Barnardo’s/HBOS Tug of War (lodged on 22 September 2005) Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*
